Optional Types with pmatch

Thomas Mailund

2018-03-30

Source: vignettes/optional-types-with-pmatch.Rmd 
OPT := NONE | VALUE(val) | ERROR(err)
try <- function(expr) {
    rlang::enquo(expr)
    tryCatch(VALUE(rlang::eval_tidy(expr)), 
             error = function(e) ERROR(e))
}
cases(try(42),
      VALUE(val) -> val,
      ERROR(err) -> err,
      NONE -> "NOTHING")
#> [1] 42
cases(try(x + 42), # x isn't defined...
      VALUE(val) -> val,
      ERROR(err) -> err,
      NONE -> "NOTHING")
#> <simpleError in rlang::eval_tidy(expr): object 'x' not found>
Ops.OPT <- function(e1, e2) {
    cases(.(e1, e2),
          .(NONE, .) -> NONE,
          .(., NONE) -> NONE,
          .(ERROR(err), .) -> ERROR(err),
          .(., ERROR(err)) -> ERROR(err),
          .(VALUE(v1), VALUE(v2)) -> VALUE(.Generic(v1, v2)))
}

Developed by Thomas Mailund.
